resources.string: Allow %1$s access to manage all files?

"Using Storage Scopes will make this app assume that it has all storage permissions that it asked for, despite not actually having any of them.
An app that doesn’t have any storage permissions is still allowed to create files and access files that it created, regardless of whether Storage Scopes is used."

"This app assumes that it has all storage permissions that it asked for, regardless of whether it actually has them.

Optionally, you can grant this app access to additional files and folders such as to those that weren’t created by the app itself."
